title: Hiroshima v. Detroit
subtitle: Periodic images indicate that they compare the effects of urban decay in Detroit with the destruction of Hiroshima, Japan, with an atomic bomb during the Second World War.
author: David Emery
vclaim: A series of images combine a realistic comparison between the city of Hiroshima, which was rebuilt 65 years after it was destroyed by an atomic bomb, and the current urban degradation in Detroit after 65 years of rule by the Democratic Party.
